description: Users may experience issues with the Windows Kerberos authentication service due to a denial of service vulnerability. This may manifest as authentication failures, difficulties in accessing network resources, or intermittent error messages indicating that the Kerberos service is unavailable. Affected build numbers include 10.0.19045.4291, 10.0.19044.4291, and others listed in the KB articles. The vulnerability can potentially disconnect users from essential services, leading to decreased productivity and increased frustration among system administrators working to troubleshoot these issues. Relevant KB Article IDs include KB-5036925, KB-5036894, KB-5036893, and KB-5036892.
